gad7_q1: Feeling nervous, anxious, or on edge
gad7_q2: Not being able to stop or control worrying
gad7_q3: Worrying too much about different things
gad7_q5: Being so restless that it is hard to sit still
gad7_q7: Feeling afraid as if something awful might happen
phq9_q1: Little interest or pleasure in doing things
phq9_q3: Trouble sleeping or sleeping too much
phq9_q4: Feeling tired or having little energy
phq9_q6: Feeling bad about yourself or that you are a failure
phq9_q8: Moving or speaking slowly or being restless
phq9_q9: Thoughts that you would be better off dead or of hurting yourself
pss10_q1: How often have you felt upset because of unexpected events?
pss10_q2: How often have you felt you could not control important things?
pss10_q3: How often have you felt nervous and stressed?
pss10_q4: How often have you felt confident in handling personal problems?
pss10_q5: How often have you felt that things were going your way?
pss10_q6: How often have you felt you could not cope with all you had to do?
pss10_q7: How often have you been able to control irritations in your life?
pss10_q8: How often have you felt on top of things?
pss10_q9: How often have you been angered by things outside your control?
pss10_q10: How often have you felt difficulties piling up beyond your control?
who5_q1: I have felt cheerful and in good spirits
who5_q2: I have felt calm and relaxed
who5_q3: I have felt active and vigorous
who5_q4: I woke up feeling fresh and rested
who5_q5: My daily life has been filled with things that interest me
